Class cosm.avatar.structure.Presentation 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class cosm.avatar.structure.Presentation 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----cosm.avatar.structure.Presentation
public class Presentation
extends Object
This class encapsulates the information needed to draw an avatar or other structured object at a given position. It contains the methods that generate ready-to-draw lists of art elements and registration points.

anchorPoint
Name of registration point from which avatar is aligned with its background, and point in background on which to align this registration point in avatar.
anchorSegment
Name of segment containing anchorPoint.
colorizedCostumes
Array of costumes that avatar is currently wearing, with their color/texture information.
orientationName
Name of current orientation.
position
Current position.
structure
The structure that the costumes will be displayed on.

Presentation()

backmostRegistrationPoints(Vector)
Returns a vector of registration points, in back-to-front order.
generateContainerSegments()
generatePresentationElements(Vector)
Given an ordered vector of ContainerSegments, returns an ordered vector of PresentationElements, with their imagePoints filled in.

anchorPoint 
  public RegistrationPoint anchorPoint
Name of registration point from which avatar is aligned with its background, and point in background on which to align this registration point in avatar.
anchorSegment 
  public String anchorSegment
Name of segment containing anchorPoint. This is an optimization; it could be found by searching all segments for a registration point with the right name.
position 
  public Position position
Current position. Note that if the costume has defined a position with this same name, the costume's position is used instead. (This currently does not handle multiple simultaneous positions.)
orientationName 
  public String orientationName
Name of current orientation.
colorizedCostumes 
  public CostumePresentation colorizedCostumes[]
Array of costumes that avatar is currently wearing, with their color/texture information.
structure 
  public Structure structure
The structure that the costumes will be displayed on. Note that this is not necessarily the structure that the costumes were defined for.

Presentation 
  public Presentation()

generateContainerSegments 
  public Vector generateContainerSegments()
generatePresentationElements 
  public Vector generatePresentationElements(Vector segments)
Given an ordered vector of ContainerSegments, returns an ordered vector of PresentationElements, with their imagePoints filled in. ImagePoints are set relative to the anchorPoint of the presentation.
backmostRegistrationPoints 
  public Vector backmostRegistrationPoints(Vector segments)
Returns a vector of registration points, in back-to-front order. The registration points are from the backmost containerSegment for each structure segment.
